tidbits.title: French Caribbean Beauty
tidbits.description: Martinique, a French Caribbean island, offers stunning beaches, lush rainforests, and a mix of French and Creole cultures.

tidbits.title: Volcanic Landscapes
tidbits.description: The island features volcanic landscapes, including Mount Pel√©e, known for its eruption in 1902, and black sand beaches.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Martinique's cuisine combines French and Creole influences, featuring dishes like accras, seafood, and flavorful tropical fruits.
